resources.string: Model objects are used for data, they have nothing to do with UI
Controller retrieves data requested by the Views
View objects are related to the UI layer
View objects are coded in HTML and jetpack compose
View objects send signals to the model
Controllers deal with data: retrieve, update, delete
Controller updates views with changes from model layer
MVC architecture is good for both small and large projects
An activity is responsible for managing user interaction with a screen
ConstraintLayouts, Buttons and TextViews are Controller examples
